title: The revised provisions will be applicable in totality
clause_text: The revised provisions will be applicable in totality. The benefit of both old and revised Regulations shall not be allowed.
section: Conversion of Industrial Zone to Residential or Commercial Zone for the Uses permissible in Residential or Commercial Zone

source_pdf.text_snippet: The revised provisions will be applicable in totality. The benefit of both old and revised Regulations shall not be allowed.
